job.name: TpcRS
job.command: cd ${SUBMITTINGDIRECTORY} setenv STARFPE NO # unsetenv DEBUG yes # setup debug # setup 64b # starver .DEV2 # starver TFG17j # starver TFG19e # starver .DEV2 # starver TFG20j # starver TFG21l limit stacksize 16m set evtsFile = $INPUTFILE0; set file1 = `basename $evtsFile .daq` set file = `basename $file1 .MuDst.root` set f = 1 set l = 500 set filel = ${file} set runG = 1 #ifndef TpcRS_Part.pl # echo $INPUTFILE0 | grep ':' # if (! $?) then # set evtsFile = `echo $INPUTFILE0 | awk -F\: '{print $1}'` # set file1 = `basename $evtsFile .daq` # set file = `basename $file1 .MuDst.root` # set f = `echo $INPUTFILE0 | awk -F\: '{print $2}'` # set l = `echo $INPUTFILE0 | awk -F\: '{print $3}'` # set filel = ${file}_${f}_${l} # set runG = `echo $INPUTFILE0 | awk -F\: '{print $5}'` # endif # echo "${evtsFile}" #else TpcRS_Part.pl set runG = `echo $file | awk -F\_ '{print $2}'` #endif echo "${file}" set output = ${filel}.event.root set logFile = ${filel}B.log # set Name = `basename $PWD` # set f=`find . -maxdepth 1 -type f -name "*${fileB}*.root"` # if ("$f" == "") then ls -l *${filel}*.root if (! $?) exit 0; #ifdef TpcRS_Part.pl ## TpcRS_Part.pl RunXIX 19GeV # root.exe -q -b 'TpcRS.C(100,"MC.y2021,TpcRS,McTpcAna,StiCA,-geantOut,phys_off,Rung.'${runG}'",0,"Bichsel,'${file}'")' >& ${logFile} #else # data MuDst.root # setenv MALLOC_CHECK_ 3 # root.exe -q -b 'bfc.C('${f}','${l}',"mtin,MC.2021,TpcRS,McTpcAna,StiCA,-geantOut,NoHistos,noRunco,RunG.'${runG}'","'${evtsFile}'","'$output'")' >& ${logFile} # root.exe -q -b 'TpcRS.C(20,"MC2021.Ideal,TpcRS,McTpcAna,StiCA,-geantOut,phys_off,Rung.'${runG}'",0,"'${file}'")' >& ${logFile} # root.exe -q -b 'TpcRS.C(20,"MC2021.Ideal,TpcRS,McTpcAna,StiCA,-geantOut,phys_off,Rung.'${runG}'",0,"'${file}'")' >& ${logFile} root.exe -q -b 'TpcRS.C(20,"MC.2021,sdt20201215,vmc,TpcRS,McTpcAna,StiCA,-geantOut,phys_off,NoHistos,noRunco,Rung.'${runG}'",0,"'${file}'")' >& ${logFile} #endif
